title: Ecommerce Platform
headline: Ecommerce Progressive Web App with user auth, categories and payments.
concept: This ecommerce has been designed to work as a base code for ecommerce solutions, including product categories, cart, checkout, user authentication and payment system out of the box. Built with Redux, Redux Thunk and Redux Saga for its state management, Firebase for its backend and Stripe for handling payments, it results in a highly robust, secure and predictable system.

title: Auth Starter
headline: Robust and highly scalable user authentication starter solution.
concept: The idea behind this work is to have a solid, clean and performant solution to be reused as a starter for any project requiring user authentication. From a modern theme-based React frontend to a robust and scalable backend with Redis sessions and Docker containers to type-safety, this starter allows the creation of new projects in less than an hour, staging and production deployment included.

title: AI Face Recognition
headline: Web App allowing users to detect faces in pictures using Clarifai's AI API.
concept: Spanning from AI face detection to user authentication, sessions, containers and serverless solutions, this project can be seen as a playground for learning and testing modern technologies. The Machine Learning used to recognise faces given a picture has been implemented through Clarifai's API.
